Preserve web page in Archive.is

When viewing a web page in a web browser (e.g., Chrome), use Share action and select this app to open that web page in Archive.is (using the default browser, not necessarily the same browser).

(Archive.is is a time capsule for web pages. It takes a 'snapshot' of a webpage that will always be online even if the original page disappears. It saves a text and a graphical copy of the page for better accuracy and provides a short and reliable link to an unalterable record of the web page.)

Disclaimers: Use at your own risk.
This app is not affiliated with Archive.is
